abstract: A fight is brewing between AT&T and the parent company of AMC, the “Mad Men” network.
snippet: A fight is brewing between AT&T and the parent company of AMC, the “Mad Men” network.
lead_paragraph: The clock is winding down on a carriage deal between AT&T and Rainbow Media, the parent company of AMC, IFC and WEtv, and the two sides are at odds over a possible fee increase.

headline.main: Playing the ‘Mad Man’ Card in Carrier Dispute
